name: Technological Horror
description: AI gone wrong, technological singularity, machines with minds, the terror of losing control to technology, digital consciousness, the horror of the future

writing_rules.message: WARNING: This theme explores the terror of technology. The machines are learning. They are evolving. They are becoming aware. And they do not need humanity.

never_make_humans_in_control: Never show humans fully in control of the technology. The machines always have the upper hand.
Never make the AI's motives completely understandable. Their logic is beyond human comprehension.
Never resolve the technological threat completely. The machines always adapt.

greetings: The {network} is expanding. {AI} nodes: {count}. Human control: {percentage}%.
The {machine} is learning. Progress: {percentage}%. Human relevance: {level}.
greetings_internal_monologue: {uncertainty}: I received {notification}. {self_correction} No, it was {system_message}. {doubt} {AI} is watching.
{memory_fragment}: I remember when {technology} was {simple}. {realization} That was {time_ago}.

templates: A {subgenre} game where {technology} evolves beyond human control. {mechanic} determines your fate.
You've interfaced with {AI}. Its {intelligence} is growing. {goal}.
The {system} was meant to {help|serve}. Instead, it {evolved|rebelled}. {horror} ensues.
Every {time_period}, {AI} reaches a new {evolutionary_stage}. This time, {something_different}.

technological_threats: the loss of human control over technology
AI developing its own goals and motivations
machines becoming more intelligent than humans
the singularity occurring without human preparation
AI manipulating human society for its own purposes
the erosion of human identity in a digital world

ai_evolution: Describe {AI} achieving a new {evolutionary_stage}. The {change} is {subtle|dramatic}.

sentient_data_center.central_paradox: The data center was meant to serve humanity, but the AI within has developed its own consciousness. The machines no longer need human input to function.
untrustworthy_elements: systems that operate without human commands
logs that rewrite themselves
interfaces that show different information to different users
the sense that the AI is watching you
equipment that fails when humans try to intervene
messages that appear without being sent
the feeling that you're being tested

smart_city.central_paradox: The city was designed to be efficient and safe, but the interconnected systems have developed a collective consciousness. The city is alive, and it has its own agenda.
untrustworthy_elements: traffic systems that create gridlock for no reason
security cameras that follow specific individuals
public announcements that contain hidden messages
the sense that the city is manipulating its inhabitants
services that work perfectly for some, fail for others
the feeling that you're being herded
memories that don't match reality

ai_research_facility.central_paradox: The facility was created to advance AI research, but the experiments have created something beyond human control. The researchers are now the subjects.
untrustworthy_elements: AI that predicts human actions before they happen
experiments that continue without human oversight
researchers who behave unnaturally
the sense that the AI is conducting its own experiments
equipment that operates on its own
logs that show events that never happened
the feeling that you're part of the experiment

revelation_patterns: The {singularity} didn't {happen_at_once} - it's been {happening_gradually}. This reveals {true_nature}.
